92The ArcBest Technologies Employee Engagement Committee formed two years 
ago and represents a diverse range of experiences, knowledge and skills. The 
committee’s ongoing goal is to engage employees in making ArcBest Technologies 
an atmosphere that promotes innovation, involvement and growth across the 
organization. One way the committee encourages engagement is by hosting a 
project showcase each quarter, which gives employees the opportunity to present 
strategic business projects and improve presentation skills. The committee also 
works with the leadership team to host panel discussions on critical topics such 
as promotions and succession planning. Employees can contact the Employee 
Engagement Committee with questions and ideas via email.ArcBest Technologies 
Employee Engagement
